contentrichtext.text: '''Xerri's Grotto''' (pronounced ''sherry'') is an underground [[cave]] in the village of [[XagÄ§ra]], [[Gozo]], [[Malta]]. It was discovered in 1924 underneath a house during digging for a well. Tours are given by the owners of the house. Xerri's Grotto is not far from another underground feature, [[Ninu's Cave]]. ==External links== * [http://www.gozo.gov.mt/pages.aspx?page=169 gozo.gov.mt] * [http://www.mccullagh.org/image/d30-31/xerri-grotto.html a picture from xerri's grotto] * [http://www.showcaves.com/english/mt/showcaves/Xerri.html showcaves.com] * [http://www.webcitation.org/query?url=http://www.geocities.com/SouthBeach/Sands/2321/Xerri.htm&date=2009-10-25+10:07:31 Gozo's Cool Stuff] {{Malta-geo-stub}} {{coord missing|Malta}} [[Category:Caves of Malta]] [[Category:Gozo]]
